message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $10,500? It's still a great deal for you, and it gives me a fair price for the product.
I've considered your latest offer, Alice. While I appreciate the adjustment, I'm still unable to go above $10,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
